definitions.definition: To put something away in a compact and tidy manner, in its proper place, or in a suitable place.
To store or pack something in a space-saving manner and over a long time.
To arrange , pack , or fill something tightly or closely .
To dispose of, lodge , or hide somebody somewhere.
To cease; to stop doing something.

main_definition: To put something away in a compact and tidy manner, in its proper place, or in a suitable place.
secondary_definitions: To store or pack something in a space-saving manner and over a long time.
To arrange , pack , or fill something tightly or closely .
To dispose of, lodge , or hide somebody somewhere.
( obsolete , slang , transitive ) To cease; to stop doing something.
